subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wilmer Flores delivered his first game-ending at-bat, and the Mets needed only six pitches to turn a 2-1 deficit into a 3-2 victory over the Colorado Rockies at Citi Field.
snippet: Wilmer Flores delivered his first game-ending at-bat, and the Mets needed only six pitches to turn a 2-1 deficit into a 3-2 victory over the Colorado Rockies at Citi Field.
